Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: In today's news people are talking about major shake-ups and changes in the world of Australian finance and sport. The Reserve Bank of Australia is set for its biggest overhaul in decades according to federal treasurer Jim Chalmers with recommendations to reshape the body now released. Meanwhile Tasmania's AFLW team's future looks brighter with a $12m annual contribution announced by the state government. However critics have slammed the JobSeeker rate offered to Australia's most vulnerable as inadequate with calls for an increase from the current rate of $44 a day.
